info.title: HyperDX External API
info.description: API for managing HyperDX alerts and dashboards

tags.name: Dashboards
tags.description: Endpoints for managing dashboards and their visualizations

by.description: User ID who silenced the alert.

savedSearchId.description: Saved search ID for saved_search alerts.

groupBy.description: Group-by key for saved search alerts.

threshold.description: Threshold value for triggering the alert.

sourceId.description: ID of the data source for this series

aggFn.description: Aggregation function to use on the data

where.description: Filter condition in Lucene query syntax

whereLanguage.description: Query language used in the where clause

groupBy.description: Fields to group the results by

metricName.description: Name of the metric (for metric data sources)

ts_bucket.description: Timestamp of the data point (bucket start time)

group.description: Group by values if groupBy was specified

NumberFormatOutput.description: Output format type (currency, percent, byte, time, number).

AggregationFunction.description: Aggregation function to apply to the field or metric value.

QueryLanguage.description: Query language for the where clause.

MetricDataType.description: Metric data type for metrics data sources.

TimeSeriesDisplayType.description: Visual representation type for the time series.

QuantileLevel.description: Percentile level; only valid when aggFn is "quantile".

decimalBytes.description: Use decimal bytes (1000) vs binary bytes (1024).

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query

aggFn.description: Aggregation function to apply to the field or metric value

level.description: Percentile level for quantile aggregations (e.g., 0.95 for p95)

field.description: Field/property name to aggregate (required for most aggregation functions except count)

alias.description: Display name for the series in the chart

where.description: Filter query for the data (syntax depends on whereLanguage)

whereLanguage.description: Query language for the where clause

groupBy.description: Fields to group results by (creates separate series for each group)

metricName.description: Metric name for metrics data sources

displayType.description: Visual representation type for the time series

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query

aggFn.description: Aggregation function to apply to the field or metric value

level.description: Percentile level for quantile aggregations (e.g., 0.95 for p95)

metricDataType.description: Metric data type for metrics data sources

metricName.description: Metric name for metrics data sources

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query

aggFn.description: Aggregation function to apply to the field or metric value

level.description: Percentile level for quantile aggregations (e.g., 0.95 for p95)

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query

fields.description: List of field names to display in the search results table

where.description: Filter query for the data (syntax depends on whereLanguage)

whereLanguage.description: Query language for the where clause

content.example:
# Dashboard Title

This is a markdown widget.

SelectItem.description: A single aggregated value to compute. The valueExpression must be omitted when aggFn is "count", and required for all other functions. The level field may only be used with aggFn "quantile".

aggFn.description: Aggregation function to apply. "count" does not require a valueExpression; "quantile" requires a level field indicating the desired percentile (e.g., 0.95).

valueExpression.description: Expression for the column or value to aggregate. Must be omitted when aggFn is "count"; required for all other aggFn values.

alias.description: Display alias for this select item in chart legends.

where.description: SQL or Lucene filter condition applied before aggregation.

metricName.description: Name of the metric to aggregate; only applicable when the source is a metrics source.

metricType.description: Metric type; only applicable when the source is a metrics source.

periodAggFn.description: Optional period aggregation function for Gauge metrics (e.g., compute the delta over the period).

LineChartConfig.description: Configuration for a line time-series chart.

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query.

select.description: One or more aggregated values to plot. When asRatio is true, exactly two select items are required.

groupBy.description: Field expression to group results by (creates separate lines per group value).

asRatio.description: Plot select[0] / select[1] as a ratio. Requires exactly two select items.

alignDateRangeToGranularity.description: Expand date range boundaries to the query granularity interval.

fillNulls.description: Fill missing time buckets with zero instead of leaving gaps.

compareToPreviousPeriod.description: Overlay the equivalent previous time period for comparison.

BarChartConfig.description: Configuration for a stacked-bar time-series chart.

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query.

select.description: One or more aggregated values to plot. When asRatio is true, exactly two select items are required.

groupBy.description: Field expression to group results by (creates separate bars segments per group value).

asRatio.description: Plot select[0] / select[1] as a ratio. Requires exactly two select items.

alignDateRangeToGranularity.description: Align the date range boundaries to the query granularity interval.

fillNulls.description: Fill missing time buckets with zero instead of leaving gaps.

TableChartConfig.description: Configuration for a table aggregation chart.

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query.

select.description: One or more aggregated values to display as table columns. When asRatio is true, exactly two select items are required.

groupBy.description: Field expression to group results by (one row per group value).

orderBy.description: SQL ORDER BY expression for sorting table rows.

asRatio.description: Display select[0] / select[1] as a ratio. Requires exactly two select items.

NumberChartConfig.description: Configuration for a single big-number chart.

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query.

select.description: Exactly one aggregated value to display as a single number.

SearchChartConfig.description: Configuration for a raw-event search / log viewer tile.

sourceId.description: ID of the data source to query.

select.description: Comma-separated list of expressions to display.

where.description: Filter condition for the search (syntax depends on whereLanguage).

MarkdownChartConfig.description: Configuration for a freeform Markdown text tile.

markdown.description: Markdown content to render inside the tile.
markdown.example:
# Dashboard Title

This is a markdown widget.

TileConfig.description: Tile chart configuration. The displayType field determines which variant is used.

TileBase.description: Common fields shared by tile input and output

config.description: Chart configuration for the tile. The displayType field determines which variant is used. Replaces the deprecated "series" and "asRatio" fields.

TileInput.description: Input / request format when creating or updating tiles. The id field is optional: on create it is ignored (the server always assigns a new ID); on update, a matching id is used to identify the existing tile to preserve â€” tiles whose id does not match an existing tile are assigned a new generated ID.

id.description: Optional tile ID. Omit to generate a new ID.

asRatio.description: Display two series as a ratio (series[0] / series[1]). Only applicable when providing "series". Deprecated in favor of "config.asRatio".

series.description: Data series to display in this tile (all must be the same type). Deprecated; use "config" instead.

FilterInput.description: Dashboard filter key that can be added to a dashboard

name.description: Display name for the dashboard filter key

expression.description: Key expression used when applying this dashboard filter key

sourceId.description: Source ID this dashboard filter key applies to

sourceMetricType.description: Metric type when source is metrics

tiles.description: List of tiles/charts in the dashboard

tags.description: Tags for organizing and filtering dashboards

filters.description: Dashboard filter keys added to the dashboard and applied to all tiles
Dashboard filter keys to add to the dashboard and apply across all tiles

tiles.description: Full list of tiles for the dashboard. Existing tiles are matched by ID; tiles with an ID that does not match an existing tile will be assigned a new generated ID.

filters.description: Dashboard filter keys on the dashboard, applied across all tiles

MetricTables.description: Mapping of metric data types to table names. At least one must be specified.

summary.description: Table containing summary metrics data. Note - not yet fully supported by HyperDX

exponential histogram.description: Table containing exponential histogram metrics data. Note - not yet fully supported by HyperDX

luceneExpression.description: An optional, Lucene version of the sqlExpression expression. If provided, it is used when searching for this attribute value.

databaseName.description: Database name for the materialized view

tableName.description: Table name for the materialized view

dimensionColumns.description: Columns which are not pre-aggregated in the materialized view and can be used for filtering and grouping.

minGranularity.description: The granularity of the timestamp column

minDate.description: (Optional) The earliest date and time for which the materialized view contains data. If not provided, then HyperDX will assume that the materialized view contains data for all dates for which the source table contains data.

aggregatedColumns.description: Columns which are pre-aggregated by the materialized view

defaultTableSelectExpression.description: Default columns selected in search results (this can be customized per search later)

timestampValueExpression.description: DateTime column or expression that is part of your table's primary key.

displayedTimestampValueExpression.description: This DateTime column is used to display and order search results.

metricSourceId.description: HyperDX Source for metrics associated with logs. Optional

traceSourceId.description: HyperDX Source for traces associated with logs. Optional

implicitColumnExpression.description: Column used for full text search if no property is specified in a Lucene-based search. Typically the message body of a log.

highlightedTraceAttributeExpressions.description: Expressions defining trace-level attributes which are displayed in the trace view for the selected trace.

highlightedRowAttributeExpressions.description: Expressions defining row-level attributes which are displayed in the row side panel for the selected row.

materializedViews.description: Configure materialized views for query optimization. These pre-aggregated views can significantly improve query performance on aggregation queries.

defaultTableSelectExpression.description: Default columns selected in search results (this can be customized per search later)

timestampValueExpression.description: DateTime column or expression defines the start of the span

logSourceId.description: HyperDX Source for logs associated with traces. Optional

sessionSourceId.description: HyperDX Source for sessions associated with traces. Optional

metricSourceId.description: HyperDX Source for metrics associated with traces. Optional

spanEventsValueExpression.description: Expression to extract span events. Used to capture events associated with spans. Expected to be Nested ( Timestamp DateTime64(9), Name LowCardinality(String), Attributes Map(LowCardinality(String), String)

implicitColumnExpression.description: Column used for full text search if no property is specified in a Lucene-based search. Typically the message body of a log.

highlightedTraceAttributeExpressions.description: Expressions defining trace-level attributes which are displayed in the trace view for the selected trace.

highlightedRowAttributeExpressions.description: Expressions defining row-level attributes which are displayed in the row side panel for the selected row

materializedViews.description: Configure materialized views for query optimization. These pre-aggregated views can significantly improve query performance on aggregation queries.

timestampValueExpression.description: DateTime column or expression that is part of your table's primary key.

resourceAttributesExpression.description: Column containing resource attributes for metrics

logSourceId.description: HyperDX Source for logs associated with metrics. Optional

timestampValueExpression.description: DateTime column or expression that is part of your table's primary key.

traceSourceId.description: HyperDX Source for traces associated with sessions.
